PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>
PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
PREFIX dgov: <http://data.gov.be#>

DELETE { ?dist dcat:downloadURL ?ckan }
INSERT { ?dist dcat:downloadURL ?wal }
WHERE
	{	?dist dcat:downloadURL ?ckan .
		FILTER (STRSTARTS(STR(?ckan),  "http://ckan-22.nam.awt.be"))
		BIND ( URI(REPLACE(STR(?ckan), "http://ckan-22.nam.awt.be", "http://opendata.digitalwallonia.be")) AS ?wal )
	}
